description: Basic Performance Management Dashboard for OpenStack System

panels.description: take average from all CPUs idle value
panels.title: avg_cpu (Idle)

panels.description:
The metric indicates the reachability status of an upstream NTP server from the LCM server. It reports whether the upstream server is reachable or not. The metric provides a binary value of either 0 (zero) or 1 (one). A value of 0 (zero) represents that the upstream NTP server is not reachable from the LCM server and a value of 1 (one) represents that the upstream server is reachable.
Check it from Infra nodes only
panels.title: CPU & Memory Usage by CSS
